title: Facebook News launches in the UK, its first market outside of the US for the curated news portal
text: As the United Kingdom prepares to sharpen its focus on how it regulates big tech companies, Facebook is taking a big step up in the role it plays in presenting media to the U.K. public, and into how it works with the country's media industry. Today it is launching Facebook News in the U.K., Facebook's [â€¦]

title: Facebook starts rolling out Facebook News to UK users and paying publishers for content
text: Facebook announced it will start rolling out its Facebook News product in the U.K. on Tuesday, and will pay publishers for their content.

title: Big Tech Looks Good Going Into Earnings
text: This week should be a good one for big tech and therefore, also for the markets.

title: Facebook, Amazon, Apple, Alphabet CEOs asked to attend EU hearing, report says
text: The European Parliament is discussing more digital regulation.

title: Expect Volatility as Facebook Prepares to Report Earnings
text: Facebook has made plenty of headlines recently, but that doesn't mean it's all doom and gloom for shares of Facebook stock. The post Expect Volatility as Facebook Prepares to Report Earnings appeared first on InvestorPlace.

title: Can Facebook Continue Its String Of Revenue Growth Amid Growing Regulatory Pressure? Earnings Ahead
text: Despite an ad boycott, Congressional hearings, and a swirl of controversies, Facebook (FB) shares hit record highs last year as people hunkered down during the pandemic and used social media to keep in touch.

title: FTC Bureau of Competition Director Ian Conner on Big Tech's antitrust risks
text: FTC Bureau of Competition director Ian Conner joins "Squawk Alley" to discuss the outlook for antitrust litigation and regulation against Big Tech.

title: NYT: Facebook oversight board will determine if Trump returns
text: Ben Smith, The New York Times media columnist, joins "Squawk Alley" to discuss Facebook's plan to determine Donald Trump's eligibility to return to the platform.

title: Is Facebook Stock A Buy?
text: The pandemic has highlighted the strengths of Facebook's business model. Headlines have been dominated by the threats surrounding the company while business opportunities have been overlooked.

title: Facebook to soar 26% on e-commerce, advertising strength, says BofA (FB)
text: Facebook's e-commerce push and increased advertising revenue will bolster the social media giant's upcoming quarterly earnings report, Bank of America analysts say. BofA maintained its "buy" rating and its $345 price target for Facebook on Monday despite concerns about antitrust lawsuits and increased regulation from a new presidential administration.

title: 7 Must Own Stocks for February
text: As January winds down and Joe Biden takes the helm, here are seven must own stocks for February. History shows it won't be an easy month.

title: BlackBerry extends its week-long rally to more than 100% after patent settlement with Facebook (BB)
text: BlackBerry extended its week-long rally on Monday and soared as much as 40% as investors continue to bid up shares following its settlement of a patent dispute with Facebook. BlackBerry traded above the $20 level on Monday for the first time since 2011, when it was still selling phones.

title: 3 Tech Giants to Watch in the Busiest Week of Earnings
text: As people's dependence on tech products and services grew during the pandemic, tech giants Microsoft (MSFT), Apple (APPL) and Facebook (FB) are likely to have done well in the December quarter.

title: Better Buy: Facebook vs. Google
text: The two 2020 "dogs of FAANG" are both facing rising regulatory pressure but are armed with mountains of cash.
